nodes.text: Maa Tin was a male quartermaster for the Galactic Republic who lived during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He was stationed in the Strike Team Oricon camp were he sold gear.

Maa Tin first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic. He is a nightmare operation vendor for the two Oricon flashpoints, Dread Fortress and Dread Palace for the Jedi Knight and Jedi Consular. However, at some point between Game Updates 2.4 and 3.0, Maa Tin and the other Nightmare Tech vendors were removed from both the Republic and Imperial camps on Oricon as part of a restructuring of the gear system.
